snippet.title: Blazing Trail-Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Blazing Trail

Escape failed! All we have left is our will to survive, the endless hordes of enemies, and enough bullets to rip them all to shreds. Blazing trail. Vertical co-op shooter, offering accessible, action-packed gameplay.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2825560/Blazing_Trail/

#videogames #steam #shmup #indiegames #gaming #gameplay #gamingvideos #games
